FuncDef: This command associates a new constraint to the associated static route such that the static route is only active ifnoneorallof the routes in the prefix list are present and active in the route-table.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of a currently configured prefix-list.
Specifies that the static route condition is met if all prefixes in the prefix-list must be present in the active route-table.
Specifies that the static route condition is met if none of the prefixes in the named prefix-list can be present in the active route-table.
